jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Gojek is the fastest growing technology company in Indonesia and is rapidly expanding regionally across SE Asia. The company operates a consumer on demand application that serves four key verticals: (i) transportation, (ii) food delivery, (iii) logistics and (iv) payments (GoPay).  Key investors currently include Google, Temasek / GIC, Tencent, KKR, Warburg Pincus, Sequoia and Visa. This year (2019), we once again made it to Fortune’s “Change the World” list through GoPay’s innovative efforts in accelerating financial inclusion for the region and the advancement of Indonesia’s digital economy. But this is just the beginning. We will continue our mission to change the world. Critical to the success of GoPay’s growth in Indonesia and regionally is to deliver on strategic partnerships that will build out the capabilities and ecosystem for users and drivers.

The Program Manager, Strategic Partnerships is responsible for overseeing large scale, multi-region delivery programs with GoPay’s regional and strategic partners and will report to the Head of Business Development & Strategic Partnerships.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Be accountable for the overall delivery of large-scale &/or regional implementations that involve strategic partners from inception through to launch
  • Collaborate effectively across both internal stakeholders in Gojek/GoPay and externally with strategic partners across all functions (i.e. business development, product, engineering, operations, legal, risk & compliance) and at multiple levels (i.e. working team to senior executives) 
  • Be resilient, flexible and resourceful in working in a fast-paced, ambiguous and complex environment 
  • Rigorously manage and track project activities and ensure they are completed within target dates, ensure project documents are clear & concise and ensure all project stakeholders adhere to project expectations
  • Continually strive to improve GoPay’s implementation and product launch capabilities involving strategic partners across multiple markets

• More than 10 years of work experience with a Bachelors Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related technical field or at least 8 years of work experience with an Advanced Degree (e.g. Masters/MBA/JD/MD)
  • Experience as a SCRUM Master, Project Leader, Project/Program Manager with exceptional knowledge of Agile/Scrum/Lean principles and practices
  • Ability to manage multiple projects of varying size and complexity simultaneously 
  • Experience with launching digital products in cards/payments, banking/financial services and e-wallets are a plus
  • Experience managing cross-functional and virtual teams of up to 20 members across a diverse range of locations, cultures and teams
  • Must demonstrate strong complex problem solving capabilities and ability to articulate complex topics to variable audiences is required
  • Excellent interpersonal skills, including the ability to develop relationships across different levels of the organization
  • Excellent written & verbal communication skills; detail-oriented & committed to a high degree of accuracy
  • A self-starter with strong organization skills and resolution management
  • This position may require moderate to significant travel between SE Asia and Bangalore
